name: Skinscape
description: In this VR artwork, UK based artist Ian Truelove scales his paintings up to gargantuan proportions to show the beauty of the pixels they are made from.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geoforce 1070 GTX Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geoforce 1080 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 350 MB available space
